values.description: A RollingWindow is an array of a fixed-size that holds trailing data. It's more efficient to store data than to make many historical data requests.
values.keywords: historical data, rolling window, trailing data, indicators, consolidators
values.og:description: A RollingWindow is an array of a fixed-size that holds trailing data. It's more efficient to store data than to make many historical data requests.
values.og:title: Rolling Window - Documentation QuantConnect.com
